alert.note: Alert for Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 5:53PM EDT until May 04 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in eastern North Carolina... North central Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Tyrrell County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 552 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alligator Lake, or 22 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Killkenny, Columbia, Pungo Lake, Phelps Lake, Frying Pan Landing and Alligator Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
